# mutter

Mutter is a super-simple event emitter.

## Installation

    $ npm install mutter --save

## Example

```js
var evt = require('mutter');

function foo(val) {
  // ...
}

evt.on('foo', foo);

evt.one('foo', 'bar'); // emit one
evt.emit('foo', 'baz'); // emit all

evt.off('foo', foo)
```
